reviewText: As described in the info. Thank you so much, I got exactly what i asked and hoped for. I love this show then, and I still love it to this day. I've been a fan for about 15 years, and I'll never stop loving this series. This is what made me interested in Japanese Anime and Manga, along with Dragon Ball Z and Gundam. I'd highly recommend this.
Title: Pokemon Battle Frontier Box 1 (DVD)

reviewText: I haven't watched it yet, but I have a feeling it wood be very good.

reviewText: Im still a huge Pokemon fan , so I still purchase Pokemon products from the figures to the show and movies . Dont have any of the games so I mainly stay to the series and figure line of Pokemon and all their products are well made and amazing . Its Pokemon , its funa and still Lovable .Battle Frontier series is ok im a collector so having this in my Pokemon series collection is a must and its a great price as well .
Title: Pokemon Battle Frontier Box 1 (DVD)

reviewText: As a child from the 90's I grew up watching this spectacular series and really loved both pokemon and digimon. Im currently collecting the boxsets of pokemon and would hope to eventually get the entire seasons if you're a fan of pokemon by this dvd its worth it. :)
Title: Pokemon Battle Frontier Box 1 (DVD)

reviewText: My son just loves this cartoon! He always watched it on TV but now he can take it with him when we travel!
